body:
Golden Rush

Player with the Most Monuments mined

Silver Rush

Player with the second most monuments mined 

MVP - Offense

Officials and Refs look through videos and choose which player did the most amazing offensive rush which lead to them winning

MVP - Defender

Officials and Refs look through videos and choose Whig player made the best defense which lead to them winning the round

Legolas 

Officials and Refs look through videos to find who did the farthest shot in the whole tourney 


Any other award suggestions that would fit?
